transArray.content: Itâ€™s really comfortable to live alone. It belongs to the kind of house that is small but well-equipped. All the drinks in the refrigerator are free, and the service staff is also super nice. You can add everything you want. The room is full of technology, and there is a round bedside lamp beside the bed, and a mobile phone stand, which is so considerate. I will only stay at his house when I come to Beijing. It is comfortable and there is breakfast. Breakfast lasts until 12 o'clock, yes Gospel of lying in bed
